Item.text: Raw Data View data visualizer displays raw packet data in two contiguous streams (input and output). Provides flexible visual and layout customization.
Data View data visualizer displays data in two separate windows. First window shows the data received from the device while the second window shows data sent to the device.
Packet View data visualizer displays each monitored data packet on separate row and provides individual packet decoding, according to different formats and protocols.
Request View data visualizer decodes all data packets and control requests sent to and received from the serial.
Statistics collects and displays statistics and device throughput. Several statistic values are calculated and displayed on the linear graph.

Message.description: Error message: Unable to retrieve data

Enumeration.description: Category: Device A Bytes Read/sec and description

Item.text: Device A Bytes Read/sec is the rate data is sent by device A.

Enumeration.description: Category: Device B Bytes Read/sec and description

Item.text: Device B Bytes Read/sec is the rate data is sent by device B.
